functionDecorators.name: createAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to create a new ACO pool. It deploys a minimal proxy for the ACO pool implementation address.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the underlying asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: isCall
parameterDecorators.description: True if the type is CALL, false for PUT.

parameterDecorators.name: baseVolatility
parameterDecorators.description: The base volatility for the pool starts. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

parameterDecorators.name: poolAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool strategy to be used.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPermissionConfig
parameterDecorators.description: The configuration data for the ACO permission on the pool.

functionDecorators.name: getAcoCreatorAuthorized
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the address of ACO creators authorized.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the ACO creator.

returnDecorators.description: The address of ACO creators authorized.

functionDecorators.name: getAcoCreatorForbidden
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the address of ACO creators forbidden.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the ACO creator.

returnDecorators.description: The address of ACO creators forbidden.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfAcoCreatorsAuthorized
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the number of ACO creators authorized for a pool.

returnDecorators.description: The number of ACO creators authorized.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfAcoCreatorsForbidden
functionDecorators.description: Function to get the number of ACO creators forbidden for a pool.

returnDecorators.description: The number of ACO creators forbidden.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Function to initialize the contract. It should be called through the `data` argument when creating the proxy. It must be called only once. The first `require` is to guarantee that behavior.

parameterDecorators.name: _factoryAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO pool implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO token factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _assetConverterHelper
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the asset converter helper.

parameterDecorators.name: _chiToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Chi token.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolFee
parameterDecorators.description: ACO pool fee percentage.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolFeeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: ACO pool fee destination.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolWithdrawOpenPositionPenalty
parameterDecorators.description: ACO pool penalty percentage on withdrawing open positions.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolUnderlyingPriceAdjustPercentage
parameterDecorators.description: ACO pool underlying price percentage adjust.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolMaximumOpenAco
parameterDecorators.description: ACO pool maximum number of open ACOs allowed.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoFactory
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO factory address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO token factory.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPermissionDataOnAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools restrictons for an ACO data. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: tolerancePricesBelow
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the below tolerance price percentages.

parameterDecorators.name: tolerancePricesAbove
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the above tolerance price percentages.

parameterDecorators.name: minExpirations
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the minimum expirations.

parameterDecorators.name: maxExpirations
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the maximum expirations.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools
parameterDecorators.description: Array of ACO pools addresses.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool fee. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolFee
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO Pool fee. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolFeeDestination
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool destination address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolFeeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO Pool destination.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool implementation address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO pool implementation.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolLendingPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the lending pool. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newLendingPool
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolLendingPoolReferral
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the lending pool referral. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newLendingPoolReferral
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new lending pool referral.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolMaximumOpenAco
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool maximum number of open ACOs allowed. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newMaximumOpenAco
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO Pool maximum number of open ACOs allowed.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool permission. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: poolAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: The permission to be set.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolStrategyPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool strategies permitted. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strategy.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: The permission to be set.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolUnderlyingPriceAdjustPercentage
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool underlying price percentage adjust. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newUnderlyingPriceAdjustPercentage
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO Pool underlying price percentage adjust. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolWithdrawOpenPositionPenalty
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool penalty percentage on withdrawing open positions. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newWithdrawOpenPositionPenalty
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO Pool penalty percentage on withdrawing open positions. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: setAssetConverterHelper
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the asset converter helper address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAssetConverterHelper
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new asset converter helper.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetConverterOnAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools asset converters. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: assetConverters
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the asset converters.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools
parameterDecorators.description: Array of ACO pools addresses.

functionDecorators.name: setAuthorizedAcoCreator
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO creator permission.

parameterDecorators.name: acoCreator
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO creator.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the creator will be authorized.

functionDecorators.name: setBaseVolatilityOnAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools base volatilities. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: baseVolatilities
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the base volatilities to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools
parameterDecorators.description: Array of ACO pools addresses.

functionDecorators.description: Function to set the Chi Token address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new Chi Token.

functionDecorators.description: Function to set the factory admin address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new factory admin.

parameterDecorators.description: Array of the fee destinations addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: fees
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the fee percentages.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools

parameterDecorators.description: Whether the creator will be forbidden.

functionDecorators.name: setForbiddenAcoCreatorOnAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools ACO creator forbidden situation. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO creator.

parameterDecorators.name: status
parameterDecorators.description: Forbidden situation.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools

parameterDecorators.name: lendingPoolReferral

parameterDecorators.name: withdrawOpenPositionPenalty

parameterDecorators.description: Value of the ACO Pool fee percentage. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

parameterDecorators.description: Value of the ACO Pool maximum number of open ACOs allowed.

parameterDecorators.name: feeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO Pool fee destination.

parameterDecorators.name: assetConverter

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools

functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools below tolerance prices percentages. Only can be called by a pool admin.

functionDecorators.name: transferPoolProxyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Function to transfer the pool proxy admin. Only can be called by the pool proxy admin.

parameterDecorators.name: pools
parameterDecorators.description: Addresses of the new pools.

functionDecorators.name: updatePoolsImplementation

parameterDecorators.description: Addresses of the new pools.

parameterDecorators.name: initData
parameterDecorators.description: Init data for the pool implementation.
